name: Mind Reflection Mirror Puzzle
description:
MIND REFLECTION is a real challenge for your brain.
Navigate through 100 mind twisting levels full of mirrors, traps, and puzzles.
You can change the path of your player by changing the rotation of mirrors which will make your player bounce in the desired direction.
The further you get the bigger the challenge. Can you solve all the puzzles?

Features:
- Be brave and navigate your soul through 100 exciting puzzles
- Be smart and collect up to 3 optional collectibles in every single level.
- Be persistent and unlock new levels and features the more points you find.
- Be patient and more levels will be added over time.
- Become a master and solve even the hardest puzzles!
